name: VodkaOrDead
description:
COLD WAR - 1968
RUSSIAN BORDER IN A NON-DISCLOSED LOCATION
THE DIRTY AMERICANS STOLE ALL THE VODKA OF OUR GLORIOUS MOTHER RUSSIA
ONLY OUR BRAVE COMMANDER, SERGEI VLADISVODKA COULD SAVE OUR PRECIOUS RECOURSE.

Instructions

- Move the player using the arrows.

- Find the knife and kill some guard to look like him (use space for it).

- Recover your vodka and try to find your way out.

- You can exit the game when you want using escape.

Install instructions

Unzip the file in Windows and play it or play it using the unity web player.

You can vote us at ludumdare: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...
